author: ekoneil
msg: - implement sort support in the URL / state management services.  This isn't complete yet and throws NYI on some of the method calls, but the correct sort information is tracked in the URL for a single grid on a page.

- move cell rendering out into a set of stateless decorators.  This allows for composing items to show up in a cell and provides a nice extensibility and testing point.  Also allows sort / filter to be applied to header cell columns in a clean way.
- delete some unused images from the coreWeb/resources/images directory
- add a simple sort test.  this doesn't actually sort the data yet (quite cheezy, yes), but it does put the correct query params in the URL.

author: crossley
msg: Use a dummy sitemap for the forrest build. Cocoon still uses the sitemap.xmap for its localhost:8888/docs

author: crossley
msg: Set project.start-uri to be index.html because we are still using book.xml style navigation.
